name: NETXP LINUX Stunnel binary usage - potential unauthorized network connection
description: Rule is designed to provide visibility into the execution of the Stunnel binary on the system. Stunnel is a program that allows you to create secure tunnels for network traffic, typically used for securing communication channels.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "*stunnel*" and
any where event.module: "auditd"
